name: ID.me First Responder Discounts
description: 10-25% discounts at 100+ major retailers after one-time verification
fullDescription: ID.me provides verified identity for first responders (firefighters, EMTs, paramedics, police) to unlock exclusive discounts at hundreds of retailers, restaurants, and service providers.
whatTheyOffer:
- One-time identity verification
- Access to 100+ retailer discounts
- 10-25% off at major brands
- Tech discounts (Apple, Samsung, Dell)
- Travel discounts (hotels, car rentals)
- Entertainment and subscription savings
howToGetIt:
1. Create free ID.me account
2. Verify first responder status with credentials
3. Upload employment verification if needed
4. Once verified, access discounts through ID.me Shop
5. Verification transfers across all participating retailers
